name: Gargoyle's Stoneplate
description: Grants 16 Armor and 16 Magic Resist for each enemy targeting the holder.

name: Archangel's Staff
description:
Grant 10 bonus Ability Power. 
 
Combat start: Grant 20 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

name: Guardbreaker
description: Grant 15% bonus Attack Damage and 15 bonus Ability Power. Abilities and attacks deal 25% more damage to shielded enemies.

name: Bloodthirster
description:
Grant 25% Omnivamp. 
 
Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

name: Blue Buff
description: Grant 10 bonus starting Mana and 20 bonus Ability Power. Reduce the holder's maximum Mana by 10. If the holder gets at least 1 takedown within 3 seconds of casting, gain 20 Mana.

name: BrambleVest
description: Grant 40 bonus Armor. Negates 75% bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. When struck by an attack, deal 75/100/150★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

name: Chalice of Power
description: Combat start: Grant 30 Ability Power to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

name: Deathblade
description: Grant 40% bonus Attack Damage.

name: Dragon's Claw
description:
Grant 80 bonus Magic Resist. Every 2 seconds, regenerate 1.2% maximum Health for each enemy targeting the holder. 

If the holder is a Dragon, increase all bonuses and effects by 20%.

name: Edge of Night
description: Once per combat: At 60% Health, briefly become stealthed, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. Then, grant 40% bonus Attack Speed.

name: Giant Slayer
description: Grant 15% bonus Attack Damage and 15 bonus Ability Power. Abilities and attacks deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1900 maximum Health.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
description: Attacks grant 6% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks.

name: Hand of Justice
description:
Grant 2 effects: 
15 Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power. 
15% Omnivamp.

Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

name: Hextech Gunblade
description: Grant 25% Omnivamp. Damage heals the lowest percent Health ally for the same amount.

name: Infinity Edge
description: Grant 15% bonus Attack Damage and 15% bonus Critical Strike Chance. Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

name: Ionic Spark
description: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped for magic damage equal to 185% of their maximum Mana.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
description: Grants 15 bonus Ability Power and 15% Critical Strike Chance. Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

name: Last Whisper
description: Grant 10% bonus Attack Speed. Dealing physical damage reduces the target's Armor by 50% for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
description: Combat start: Shields the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row for 300/350/400★ damage for 15 seconds.

name: Morellonomicon
description: Grant 20 bonus Ability Power. Magic or true damage from an Ability burns the target, dealing 10% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration.

name: Protector's Vow
description:
Grant 15 bonus starting Mana. 

Once per combat: At 50% Health, allies within 3 hexes gain a 10% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 2 seconds. Shielded allies gain 15 Armor and 15 Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

name: Quicksilver
description:
Grant 20% bonus Attack Speed. 

Combat start: Grant immunity to crowd control for 15 seconds.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
description: Grant 55 bonus Ability Power.

name: Rapid Firecannon
description:
Grant 30% bonus Attack Speed and 1 bonus Attack Range. 

Attacks cannot miss.

name: Redemption
description: Heal allies within 1 hex for 12% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 25% less multi-target damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

name: Runaan's Hurricane
description: Grant 10 bonus Attack Damage. Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 70% Attack Damage as physical damage.

name: Shroud of Stillness
description: Combat start: Shoot a beam that increases the maximum Mana of affected enemies by 35% until they cast.

name: Spear of Shojin
description: Grant 20 bonus Ability Power. Every 3rd attack restores 10 additional Mana.

name: Statikk Shiv
description: Grant 10% bonus Attack Speed. Every 3rd attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 50 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

name: Sunfire Cape
description: Grant 150 bonus Health. Every 2 seconds, an enemy within 2 hexes is burned for 10% of their maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration.

name: Tactician's Crown
description: Your team gains +1 maximum team size.

name: Thief's Gloves
description: Each round: Equip 2 random items.

name: Titan's Resolve
description:
Grants 2 Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.  

At full stacks, grant 25 Armor and 25 Magic Resist.

name: Warmog's Armor
description: Grant 700 bonus Health.

name: Zeke's Herald
description: Combat start: Grant 30% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

name: Zephyr
description: Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

name: Zz'Rot Portal
description: Combat start: taunt enemies within 4 hexes. On death, a Voidspawn arises, taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are 25% effective.
